divs: Sighting Detailswent outside to have a smoke and walked to the north side of my house and as i looked to the west i saw what looked to be a orange light in the sky i watched it as it came closer iwas tring to see a blinking light to debunk my self but there wasnt one so i ran and got my girlfriend to come witness this special occasion and we watched it for probally 2 mins or so she was busy iguess but i ran and got a camera and i was trying to get it on the screen but i couldn't then i looked back up but it was gone i know it wasnt a satellite i went over that with her too it was really much closer
Summary: was flying outa the west moving east southeast looked like a low plane but really bright no blinking light no sound allmost moved like satellite but much closer
trends: there have been no other sightings in veseli \ lonsdale
This sighting has never been favorited.
